articles.author: MARTIN CRUTSINGER AP Economics Writer
articles.title: US construction spending up 0.6% in November, led by housing
articles.description: Spending on U.S. construction projects rose a solid 0.6% in November as gains in home building and government projects offset weakness in nonresidential construction
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
Spending on U.S. construction projects rose a solid 0.6% in November as gains in home building and government projects offset weakness in nonresidential construction.
It was the fifth consecutive monthly gain and a sharp improvement from a ti… [+1644 chars]

articles.author: CARLO PIOVANO Associated Press
articles.title: Oil prices jump on fears of Iranian retaliation against US
articles.description: The price of oil has surged on the news of the United States' military strike that killed Iran's top general
articles.content:
LONDON -- 
The price of oil surged Friday on concerns that Iran might respond to the killing of its top general by the United States by disrupting global supplies of energy from the Mideast.
If sustained, the rise in oil prices could lead to more expensive … [+3245 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Grammy-nominated rapper DaBaby arrested on battery charge
articles.description: Police in Miami have arrested Grammy-nominated rapper DaBaby on a battery charge and he's being held on an arrest warrant on similar charges out of Texas
articles.content:
MIAMI -- 
Grammy-nominated rapper DaBaby was arrested on a battery charge in Miami on Thursday night and is being held on an arrest warrant out of Texas, according to court records.
The rapper, whose real name is Jonathan Kirk, was booked into the Miami-Dad… [+1976 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: China station admits New Year's drone show was prerecorded
articles.description: A Shanghai TV station has acknowledged that footage of a formation of 2,000 drones flying over the city broadcast on New Year's Eve had actually been prerecorded days before
articles.content:
BEIJING -- 
A Shanghai TV station has acknowledged that footage of a formation of 2,000 drones flying over the city broadcast on New Year's Eve had actually been prerecorded days before. 
The footage had been the highlight of Dragon TV's holiday gala and pr… [+929 chars]
